DOC.criteria: Male female subject diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus either never major adverse cardiac event ( MACE ) diagnose MACE diagnose least 6 month ago , , accord judgement treat general practitioner , receive hyperlipidemic therapy . Major adverse cardiac event ( MACE ) include myocardial infarction , coronary angioplasty , coronary artery bypass graft revascularization procedure . At Screening : Visit 1 ( week 4 ) : 1 . Male patient age > 35 ≤75 year postmenopausal female patient ≤75 year diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus 2 . Patients euthyroid least six month 3 . Written inform consent obtain At Visit 2 ( week 0 ) : 4 . LDL cholesterol ≥130 mg/dl ( 3.3 mmol/l ) < 190 mg/dl ( 4.9 mmol/l ) 5 . Triglycerides < 150 mg/dl ( 1.69 mmol/l ) < 600 mg/dl ( 11.3 mmol/l ) 6 . Sum LDL5 LDL6 cholesterol ≥25 mg/dl ( 0.65 mmol/l ) 7 . Follicle stimulate Hormone ( FSH ) > 30 U/l female patient age < 60 year FSH > 20 U/l female patient age ≥60 year HbA1c > 8.0 Creatine kinase ( CK ) > 5 time upper limit normal Patients take lipid lower medication within 8 week screen visit
